schema.title: ReservoirSegment
schema.description:
A reservoir segment is an earth volume within a reservoir (e.g., reservoir zone, reservoir pattern, subsidence bowl, drainage region of one or more wells, etc.). Each reservoir segment is a unique and spatially non-overlapping part of a reservoir.
A comprehensive set of Segments can be built with a PersistedCollection.

ParentReservoirEntityID.title: Parent Reservoir Entity Identifier
ParentReservoirEntityID.description: Identifier linking to the parent reservoir entity (It could be either a segment or a reservoir)

CompartmentInterpretationID.title: Reservoir Compartment Interpretation Identifier
CompartmentInterpretationID.description: If a full-fledged earth model is built, this property takes the role of SectorID to refer to a ReservoirCompartmentInterpretation.

CompartmentMemberIdentifier.title: Compartment Member Identifier
CompartmentMemberIdentifier.description: If CompartmentInterpretationID is populated, this identifies the member of the data.ReservoirCompartmentUnits[]. Such a member refers to the intersecting RockFluidUnitInterpretation and StratigraphicUnitInterpretation instances.

SectorID.title: Sector Identifier
SectorID.description: Identifier of the Persisted Collection in which are referred the whole set of child segments constituting a comprehensive sector. A Persisted Collection is only used when no full-fledged earth model is available. See also ReservoirCompartmentInterpretationID with CompartmentMemberIdentifier for the earth model usage.

IsIsolated.title: Is Isolated
IsIsolated.description: This flag indicates that this reservoir segment (usually a fault block) is hydraulically isolated (i.e., not in pressure communication) from other segments in the reservoir.

OriginalHydrocarbonPoreVolume.title: Original Hydrocarbon Pore Volume
OriginalHydrocarbonPoreVolume.description: This is the best estimate of the original hydrocarbon total pore volume of the reservoir segment at initial conditions.

StructuralOrganizationInterpretationID.title: Structural Organization Interpretation ID
StructuralOrganizationInterpretationID.description: The reference to an earth model structural organization, which contains the list of relevant fault and horizon interpretations for this ReservoirSegment.

ReservoirSegmentTypeID.title: Reservoir Segment Type Identifier
ReservoirSegmentTypeID.description: DEPRECATED: Use IntentPurposeUseDescription instead. The use of the reference value list reference-data--ReservoirSegmentType is no longer encouraged. Previously: Identifier of the reference-data object describing the type of the reservoir segment (note: not a validated field). This brief description is intended to afford the consumer of this data the intent/purpose/use for which this reservoir segment exists.

IntentPurposeUseDescription.title: Intent or Purpose or Use Description
IntentPurposeUseDescription.description: This brief description is intended to inform the consumer of this data about the intent/purpose/use for which this reservoir segment exists.

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: Any relevant remark or comment to characterize this Reservoir Segment

SegmentTopDepthTVDSS.title: Segment TopDepth TVD Subsea
SegmentTopDepthTVDSS.description: For a reservoir zone, this is the average true vertical depth subsea to the top of the zone.
